inlineContent.text: NearPary Connect IOS SDK helps our client to wireless connect,pair,integrate their POS/Cashier IOS soulutins with Nearpay android Softpos termainls in order to remotly execute transactions on connected terminals

abstract.text: NearPary Connect IOS SDK for wireless integration with Nearpay Softpos termainls.
Send Purchase job to connected terminal
receive result for reconciliation job or reveive fail error
Connect and pair Nearpay terminal then start sending Jobs and get results
Send Refund job to connected terminal
receive result for reversal job or reveive fail error
NearPary Connect IOS SDK for wireless integration with Nearpay Softpos termainls.
Send Reconciliation Job  to connected terminal
receive result for refund job or reveive fail error
Send Reversal  Job  to connected terminal
receive result for purchase job or reveive fail error
